channel.title: Does death scare you?
channel.description:
Does death scare you?
It's not that it scares me, it just always tends to linger at the back of my mind.

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

TinyScape:

When I die, I want to be a pigeon.

You’d be living with Mike Tyson, <3

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Drowning is supposed to be a peaceful (srsly) way to go.

it’s not, actually

you know those movie portrayals of people drowning, where they scream for help etc? that doesn’t happen, you’ll be in a state of panic and waving your arms about, which to the normal layperson might just seem like you’re swimming or playing, eventually when you start to succumb to the lack of oxygen you’ll start to sink in the foetal position

so sure, it’s peaceful after all the panic and gasping for air

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

the only thing I dream about is runescape and girls.

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:97, topic:451577”][quote author=Dark Wing link=topic=554459.msg4094448#msg4094448 date=1346704556]

I’m not scared of dying but I am scared of leaving who I love behind. I had an odd dream to help me with the thought.

I was in my deathbed with my three sons sitting near me. I looked at them each in turn, looked up at the window, pointed at the sun and said “I’ll be apart of that one day”. Then I died.

That’s a strange dream? Was this question on your mind before you went to sleep??
[/quote]

No. I wasn’t thinking about death. I was feeling guilty, and it suppressed all my feelings of sadness.[/quote]
Most of my dreams are about chicks or things I really want to do but can’t. Like one time I have a dream about my girlfriend, we were about to kiss and then I was in a new setting, believe itmor not runescape. I remember seeing in my a dream a right click come up amd instead of “trade” it said “kiss” so I woke up thinking I was so pathetic Lmfao.

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Dark Wing, post:94, topic:451577”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=554459.msg4094311#msg4094311 date=1346698617]
I’m not scared of dying but I am scared of leaving who I love behind. I had an odd dream to help me with the thought.

I was in my deathbed with my three sons sitting near me. I looked at them each in turn, looked up at the window, pointed at the sun and said “I’ll be apart of that one day”. Then I died.
[/quote]
That’s a strange dream? Was this question on your mind before you went to sleep??[/quote]

No. I wasn’t thinking about death. I was feeling guilty, and it suppressed all my feelings of sadness.

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

`Aaron:

I am not afraid of death, i am afraid of the way i will die. Burning, drowning, shot, stabbed, hit by a car, falling off a building, overdose, its all so horrible.

Drowning is supposed to be a peaceful (srsly) way to go. Overdosing if you are doing the right ones is the scariest in my opinion. You’ll never be able to stop it or see it coming unless you get lucky by taking measures to prevent it.

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Wing Dark Wing
item.description:
@Dark_Wing wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:93, topic:451577”]I’m not scared of dying but I am scared of leaving who I love behind. I had an odd dream to help me with the thought.

I was in my deathbed with my three sons sitting near me. I looked at them each in turn, looked up at the window, pointed at the sun and said “I’ll be apart of that one day”. Then I died.[/quote]
That’s a strange dream? Was this question on your mind before you went to sleep??

Anyways,byes death does scare me unless I have done everything in my life that I always wanted to doto make it complete. Also I might be scared of what comes after :-0

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:90, topic:451577”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=554459.msg4093355#msg4093355 date=1346613525]

I’m not scared to die, but I’m a little bit scared of what comes after.

This is how I feel. What if nothing happens and your just dead… You die then poof nothing.

If there is nothing then there is nothing and you won’t have to worry about anything.

That’s why I am scared of dying because There should be something after…
[/quote]

just like there should be something before being born?[/quote]
Mind fucked? o_O

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

RandQm:

I’m not afraid of death itself but for the moment right before it.

Don’t worry, It’ll be over before you know it.

If I had to guess at how you’d die, I’d say getting party-vanned. Suicide is the only option of course. Keep that panic program handy, lol!

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:73, topic:451577”][quote author=Phillipé link=topic=554459.msg4075790#msg4075790 date=1344814582]

Why should anyone be scared of the absolute? You can’t avoid death, some can merely delay it by the choices they make in life.

It’s going to happen, deal with it.

Who says you can’t cheat death?

By cheat you mean delay right?
[/quote]

Relatively speaking we’re ridiculously close to being able to transplant human intelligence to machines. It definitely isn’t possible to life forever but you can live a long enough life that it wouldn’t be worth living any longer.[/quote]
So, you mean delay right?

Read full topic

item.title: Does death scare you?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:75, topic:451577”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=554459.msg4078096#msg4078096 date=1345064324]
Actually there is always a way to learn about God no matter what.
[/quote]

because everyone around the world believes the same thing

because everyone ‘of the same religion’ believes the same thing

because 46 thousand denominations of christianity don’t exist[/quote]
Get a brain, if you cannot make up Christianity by yourself and nobody told you anything about it, you clearly deserve to burn in hell. And the correct domination is my own, and the only correct belief is what I believe.
